channel.title: Ventures on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Ventures on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Dwarves Ventures Fund 0
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: It all started when us, a couple of product people realized with our expertise in technology, our passion for outstanding software, we have the ability to uplift like-minded founders by helping them build and launch their startups. The idea became clearer when our network of makers, industry experts and investors broadened steadily. We had every signal that a VC, by makers and for makers, would be the right path for us.
